name: KillSwitch
description:
Created for Metroidvania Month 9

Andrew Cojanu - Programming and Boss Concepts
Dari Noorbaksh - Art and Level Design
Richard Kuefler - Music

Controls:

Xbox Controller:

  • Jump - A
  • Dash - B
  • Blink - Y
  • Flip - X
  • Shoot - RT
  • Melee - RB
  • Beam - LT
  • Grenade - LB

Keyboard 

  • Jump - K
  • Dash - L
  • Blink - Shift + L
  • Flip - Shift + K
  • Shoot - J
  • Melee - Shift + J
  • Beam - I
  • Grenade - Shift + I
  • Pause - Enter

Updated with some minor fixes
